product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Cold Pasta Salad - 2 Servings
long_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Cold Pasta salad features pasta tossed with garden vegetables, cheese and herbs. Just add cold water and enjoy! Remove olive oil pack and add 1 cup of cold water; stir well and let sit for 3 min., then add olive oil. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Cold Pasta salad features pasta tossed with garden vegetables, cheese and herbs. Just add cold water and enjoy!
